data.title: Beating The Book: The 2023 Major League Baseball Betting Preview - Beating The Book with Gill Alexander
meta_keywords: Beating The Book: The 2023 Major League Baseball Betting Preview
Beating The Book with Gill Alexander
data.meta_description:
Host Gill Alexander, Fangraphs’ Paul Sporer, VSiN's Adam Burke and VSiN contributor Jason Weingarten break down the upcoming MLB season from all angles, analyzing off-season moves to find plenty of value and opportunity in various season long markets on this special 2023 MLB Betting Preview edition of the Beating The Book podcast.  (March 27, 2023)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
data.text:

(March 27, 2023)
